overview:
Jamie began his career in the printing world, planning and managing workflow solutions for companies like Capital Cities/ABC, Knight Ridder Inc., and Brown Publishing. As the newspaper world transitioned their presence to the web, he found a new passion applying his experience to content management systems and the challenges of ensuring businesses make the internet a key part of their engagement strategy.

Fast forward 12 years and Jamie is a passionate expert in the open source community. He spends his days/nights helping clients build engaging strategies, finding new ways to evangelize in the open source community and planning new products and solutions for clients and partners. Having executed planning and development on over 200 sites, Jamie brings a broad cross section of web experience to any project.

In Jamie’s free time, you most likely find him spending time with his family, crafting in his wood shop, digging a new garden bed or taking photos of local Nashville singers and songwriters. He is passionate about social change, photography, living green/sustainable and helping others in his community.

Specialties Online strategy, UX/UI design, process and workflow development, branding and marketing, web development, web server platform development, Apple systems administration, Adobe application training, open source community building
